summary: This is an email from Assistant United States Attorney Andrew to an unspecified recipient, requesting service of a subpoena on a court reporter who took a sworn statement. The email includes attachments of the subpoena and the statement, indicating preparation for admitting statements in court.

persons.name: Andrew
persons.context: Sender of the email requesting service of a subpoena on a court reporter for a sworn statement, working in the Southern District of New York.

locations: 1 Saint Andrews Plaza, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: An Assistant U.S. Attorney is seeking to subpoena a court reporter regarding a sworn statement.
The email includes attachments of a subpoena and the sworn statement itself.
The purpose is to potentially admit the statements in court proceedings.
The correspondence is dated September 15, 2021, indicating ongoing legal activity related to the case.
